General.Name: Kingenta Ecological Engineering Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Kingenta Ecological Engineering Group Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells fertilizers in China and internationally. Its products include compound, slow/controlled-release, water soluble, and other fertilizers; bio simulants, such as potassium fulvic acid, seaweed extracts, chitosan, and polyaspartic acid; efficiency enhancers, and EDTA chelated micronutrients. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Linyi, China.
General.Address: No.19 Xingda West Street, Linyi, China, 276700
